Text:
Easier way: Close game->Menu->New Game->Select Mission->Mision 2
Then you start the mission with principal weapons and all ammo and when you get to this point of the mission will be ammo.
Tried Rulicos. Still no ammo. Will try this.
worked for me restarted level then had ammo in my gun

The easier and ultimate way to fix the ammo problem:
Type "MAP" in console [“] and level reboots. Play it again and now you have ammo for BOLT SNIPER.

Enjoy!!
Guys. To get ammo, just restart the mission and you will have ammo, i tired it and i got ammo and was able to continue the game
crysis 3 crashes when i restart and try to enter the second level
